World

Class DoorTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Utility.Entity
        • World.Tile
          • World.DoorTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DoorTile
extends Tile
    This class keeps track of which doors will be active when the respective map is used, leaving the rest up to its superclass, Tile. DoorTile
    Author:
    kristoffer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • DoorTile

        public DoorTile(int id,
        int x,
        int y,
        int width,
        int height,
        int toMap,
        int toTileId,
        int fromDoorId)
        Parameters:
        id - The tiles ID
        x - The X coord of the tile
        y - The Y coord of the tile
        width - The width of the tile
        height - The height of the tile
        toMap - The map to go to
        toTileId - The tileID to go to on the next map
        fromDoorId - The tileID to go from
